name: Pastel Chime Continue
overview: 10 years have passed after the episodes of Pastel Chime. Nagihara Yuuki is a transfer student from Private Farneze AS to Kouryou Academy in the Rubens continent. Dramatic encounters and reunions occur as he is transferred. As he spends every day at Kouryou Academy it will help him walk the earnest way of becoming a mature adventurer.
